document_data.name: Judgment of Abd Hikmat
document_data.mainbody: The '''Judgment of Abd Hikmat''' was an item that could be found in [[Zakhara]], the Land of Fate.
document_data.Description: This item was a simple scroll with nonmagical script.
document_data.Powers: This scroll was the judgment of [[Abd Hikmat]], a long-dead ''qadi'' whose name literally meant "slave of wisdom," concerning ownership rights to the pearl banks of [[Jumlat]] and [[Gana]]. Abd Hikmat ruled that Jumlat broke the Law and awarded more of the banks to Gana.
